Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: Lattie R DeBarr
Reviews.Content: is a nice tablet for the price fairly fast, camera and video quality are not real good.I use it to keep beside my easy chair for news updates,weather,email,YouTube and to search the web.Netflix doesn't work on it for some reason. I use it also for all my amazon ordering and tracking.very useful go ago between for your computer there by your chair so you don't have to get up. also has audible alarms when you get email or news or weather updates.just handy to have, oh also play solitaire on it too.:-)

Reviews.Title: NOT WORKED
Reviews.Author: Alex M. Falcon
Reviews.Content: LASTED A FEW DAYS BUT THEN RUNNING WELL LIT NO MORE. I THANK THAT I WOULD REFUND. THIS ARTICLE IN THE HOUSE CAN STILL GO TO PICK. THANK YOU FOR EVERYTHING.

ProductInfo.Features:
Cortex-A9 processor and dual core VIA 8880 chip
Android 4.2 operating system
Supports 1080P HD video playback and HDMI output
Conveniently surfs the internet with Wi-Fi
0.3MP front camera and 2.0MP rear camera with auto focus function
ProductInfo.Name: Alldaymall® 7 Inch Android 4.2 Dual Core VIA 8880 1.2GHz Tablet PC (4GB, Wi-Fi, HDMI, Dual Camera, Capacitive Touch)(Black & Pink)
